Header: Alexander Wang takes leather where its never been before
Content: Alexander Wang debuted his fall collection in Brooklyn, New York. Leather aprons, biker shorts and various types of vests and hats were used throughout the collection giving looks a streetwise flair. Oversized and asymmetrical rugby and polo shirts added to the collections edgy feel. Wang put a twist on the traditional tweed coat with spray painted smiley faces. Evening looks where both sophisticated and edgy and sexy and soft with low cuts, high slits and backless accents. Unexpected pairings of skirts of boxers shorts and slip dresses over button down shirts continue to make Wang a trend setter.
